title: Cicero Brutus 3 - we learn in lines 3-4

content.question: We learn from the words homines . . . iucundi (lines 3-4) that

choices.label: Brutus and Atticus were both married
Cicero was often interrupted during his private conversations
Cicero hoped to settle his argument with Brutus and Atticus
Cicero, Brutus, and Atticus were all close friends

content.answer: Cicero, Brutus, and Atticus were all close friends
